items.sentence: Tom wondered why Mary wanted to study French.
Tom wondered why everyone was staring at him.
Tom worked hard to get the work done on time.
Tom worked overtime the day before yesterday.
Tom works very hard, but not as hard as Mary.
My friend doesn\'t believe that ghosts exist.
A good coach is like a father to his players.
A group of children were playing in the park.
A person like Tom probably knows how to swim.
After slapping Tom, Mary ran out of the room.
Anyone who has made a promise should keep it.
Are there many Chinese restaurants in Boston?
Tom convinced Mary that it wasn\'t his fault.
Tom couldn\'t afford to buy what Mary wanted.
The fog prevented the planes from taking off.
The last time I saw him, he was very healthy.
The price they are charging seems reasonable.
I hope you\'re not planning to do that today.
I thought you might know Tom\'s phone number.
I tried to pretend I was something I wasn\'t.
